website_summaries.verdict: An adorable gingerbread house kit with numerous possibilities for holiday creativity.
pros: Offers the ability to make an adorable Santa's workshop scene or to use your imagination to create your own
Comes with lots of colorful candies, including characters like Santa and an elf
cons: Some packages arrived with broken gingerbread or stale frosting and candy

customer_reviews.title: All pieced intact!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this kit and thankfully all the gingerbread pieces were intact and unbroken!! All the candy is included, lots of frosting and instructions. I'll update after I build it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette C.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this kit, and ALL the Wilton kits in fact, is great, EXCEPT the gingerbread! If you are getting these for fun or display purposes you will be okay. But if you plan to eat it you will be HUGELY disappointed. Yuck. They also included gumballs as one of the decorative candies! Double yuck!
customer_reviews.author: Mary C Denomie

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up to dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids had a difficult time putting this together, even with our help! The icing didn't get/stay firm enough to hold up the walls so we had to use most of the icing for that purpose. Then we didn't have much left to decorate the rest. Also, dogs seem to enjoy this tasty treat so keep it up on a high shelf/counter!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny G.

customer_reviews.title: Old and hard.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Planned a fun day with my boys. We bought two of these. They were purchased a week apart. Both were old. Frosting was hard. Some we had to heat to be able to use and some was hard as a rock. I feel as if these were left from last year.
customer_reviews.author: shana marie

customer_reviews.title: Fun!  Used our imagination
customer_reviews.text: This kit came with the correct number of components but not the right colors of frosting and the frosting that was included was more like putty than frosting even after following all the directions to knead it. We made our own frosting and created a unique workshop. Check the contents upon arrival to see if it is all there or if it needs to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Teacup

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Came with a piece broken, but easy fix. Fun to make something other than a house.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Fun to decorate, difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to have some fun time with my grandchildren. They had fun playing with the pieces and decorating them, kid style, but they did not stay together when I tried to assemble the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we wanted for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Good product. All pieces were in tact. Met expectations for money spent
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Came Shattered
customer_reviews.text: This came shattered...my daughter was SO excited for this project we just “glued” it together with the icing. It also appeared that this was previously opened and possibly used bc there was doubles of black icing and black icing in one of the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Kinda good kinda not
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know it was several years old, cookie was very hard and icing hardened up. Still kinda fun making it
customer_reviews.author: Charl

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Several things were broken and we had to “glue” them with the ining
customer_reviews.author: Polly Talbott

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Horrible . It was all stale I threw it all away I believe it has been out since last Christmas so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken :-(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it arrived broken. I read some similar reviews after the fact. Maybe these aren’t the best for shipping. Bummed since I have to run out and try to find in person for the kids today. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie CULLEN

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I received a lighthouse in error when I ordered the Santa workshop. Many of the pieces arrived broken and could not be assembled properly. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: came broken
customer_reviews.text: pool manage of the package make the product damaged, I have to fixed at home really sad experience
customer_reviews.author: Francisco de Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!! Bought this for my 4 year olds Christmas in July.....Frosting was hard and wouldn’t stick.... seemed very old.... throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great if the gingerbread house wasn’t broken
customer_reviews.text: Our gingerbread house was broken all over in its packaging. My 4 yo was very upset
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett McCraw

customer_reviews.title: Product was old and icing very hard
customer_reviews.text: Product icing for everything was brick hard. Could use it and had to throw away. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER LITTLE

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging - will most likely come broken.
customer_reviews.text: Cute for the price. However came with zero packaging and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Fun to build.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed building this workshop. Our family has a gingerbread building get together every year. I like to do something different than a gingerbread house. This was fun. The floor turned out when you smear white frosting across it and then scrap the frosting back off. The white stays in the grooves and it really looks great. Fun
customer_reviews.author: Expanding Solutions

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The Santa's Workshop Gingerbread kit was a disappointment. We opened up the box and 2 of the major pieces (walls) were broken and then the icing appeared to be old, we put it in warm water as directed but, it was still crumbly and would not spread or stick to the gingerbread. My 8 year old was sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: I Don't reccomended
customer_reviews.text: The box was missing the little table. Additionally, it was extremely hard to put together without collapsing. The frosting they provided was just not good, the consistency didnt stick, maybe that's why it kept collapsing. I dont reccomend, money wasted. This is a picture after a third collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble. Frosting is a no-go.
customer_reviews.text: Frosting was so hard and it took forever for it to soften. After softening, still couldn’t get it to stand up. Had to buy separate frosting.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Jarding

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: The frosting was dry and fondant hard. Cookies were broken.
customer_reviews.author: K1MB3RLY

customer_reviews.title: Came cracked, icing was crumbly
customer_reviews.text: This would have been cute, but there were two main problems: the back wall came split in half. I "repaired" it as best as I could. Worse, though, the icing never softened up to be usable. It was crumbly and didn't flow at all. We warmed it as instructed, but it just came out as little bits. My daughter gave up and now this is sitting half finished until I have the time to make my own icing. I think this is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Buendia

customer_reviews.title: Stale, expired, parts not useable
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE. Have used Wilton for years but suspect the kits I received from Amazon are past their use-by dates...considerably. Icing, and fondant were not useable—completely rigid and crumbly. The gingerbread pieces were severely broken—more so than you would expect due to being stale. And the gumdrop candies, although sealed in a bag, we’re hard as rocks. No part of the kit did nothing appear to have been sitting for years. It was all stale and not useable. Also would like to add that I purchased three of these kits, and they were all bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Almost every piece of gingerbread was cracked and we never could soften up the icing well enough to use.
customer_reviews.author: Doree Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Awful frosting
customer_reviews.text: Got the Santa's workshop in the mail me and my daughters opened the box and this is the icing we received rock hard. So disappointing 😞. My girls were so excited to do this and now I have to go spend more money to get new icing just to do the product. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Zaviska

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I question whether this was last year’s gingerbread kit. It came with one piece broken in 5 pieces and the royal icing was so hard and dried out I couldn’t use it even after kneading it forever. I have used Wilton kits before and have always found them great. This is the first time I ordered it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Szczechowski

customer_reviews.title: Not well packaged ,!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is how it arrived...mostly crumbs. Can not be put together. Opened package and crumbs fell out. Very disppointed.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: The frosting was hard and did not spread well  The cookie parts were broken.
customer_reviews.text: The Gingerbread parts were broken and the frosting was terrible. It was hard and dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Broken!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Didn't know until friend's 4 yr old opened my gift, only to find the gingerbread pieces were broken too small to put back together. He was super sad! And obviously I can't return it since it was a gift, a broken gift. :(
customer_reviews.author: DONEA R.

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: arrived in so many pieces, broken, had to throw away. kids disappointed
customer_reviews.author: K. roberts

product_meta.title: Wilton Build-it-Yourself Gingerbread Scene Decorating Kit
product_meta.description: Style:Santa's WorkshopWant a different kind of gingerbread decorating experience this year? Create a familiar gingerbread scene everyone will remember. The kit contains everything you need for building and decorating including pre-baked gingerbread scene pieces, 4 types of candy, Santa’s workshop icing decorations, white, green and red ready-to-use icings, black icing tube, 3 decorating bags, 3 tips, cardboard base plus a helpful instruction sheet.
feature_bullets: You can decorate your scene using the inspiration on the package or create your own
4 gingerbread panels are pre-baked and embossed; assembled scene measures approximately 6.25 in. wide x 7 1/8 in. deep x 7.5 in. high
Contains milk, wheat; made on equipment that also processes egg, soy, tree nuts
Build and decorate a different gingerbread project this year. This Santa’s Workshop gingerbread scene looks great placed under the Christmas tree!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
